data.title: Legendary Jay Leno Bringing His Show to Flint’s Capitol Theatre
data.meta_description: Here's your shot to see Jay Leno at the historic Capitol Theatre in Flint for a night of iconic humor and entertainment.
data.text:
There's legendary comics, and then there's the legend. Get ready to laugh, Flint! The legendary Jay Leno is coming to town, bringing his iconic humor to the Capitol Theatre.

Known for his quick wit and charm, Jay Leno has been a staple in the comedy world for decades. Now, he's bringing his signature style to Flint, promising an evening filled with laughter and fun. Whether you're a longtime fan or new to his comedy, or even a car enthusiast who follows the popular Jay Leno's Garage, this is your chance to see the former Tonight Show host live on stage.

When is Jay Leno Heading to Flint?

The FIM announced that Jay Leno will take the stage at the historic Capitol Theatre on November 14th for one amazing night. You can pretty much guarantee the show is going to be a quick sell out and fans are thrilled to hear he's coming to town.

“We’re unbelievably excited to have someone of Jay Leno’s caliber and talent coming to the historic FIM Capitol Theatre,” Rodney Lontine, FIM president and CEO said. “He’s practically a household name. His love of cars also makes him a perfect fit here in Flint with its rich automotive history. His show will be something everyone can enjoy. People should get their tickets right away before they sell

out!”

When Do Tickets for Jay Leno Go On Sale?

Tickets for the November 14th show will go on sale to the public at 10 a.m. on Friday, August 9th. Presale for FIM Loyalty Club members will be on Thursday, August 8th from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m. Tickets start at $75 and $55 for Genesee County residents.
